name: Printer Madness 2
description:
You play as a printer service man who had enough. Try to use the broken printer as a weapon and get points for destruction!

DEVLOG COMING SOON

__________________________________________________

Controls:

WASD - Move player

E- Take Printer

You can leave the level by going to the service shed.

__________________________________________________

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam with the theme: OUT OF CONTROL.  Submitted 20 minutes late by the email option.

The team consists of sypdev, kikapas & fecik. Most of the assets are from packs made by synthy studios and here is the link for music used in the project.

All that aside, please enjoy!
